description:
Mario is a hot blooded Italian boy from the East - he�s got that charming accent to match. I love it when he says, "Classy."
He�s done work before, but he�s got such a great hot look, and that kick stand of his is really impressive! I guess what they say about Italians is true! It floors me every time I see it. He�s got a beefy body that I find incredibly hot and well. . .manly. He�s just turned 30, and maybe I am getting too old to tell, but he looks like he is 22 to me.
He loves the ladies, but does seem to get off showing off his body. A true exhibitionist. He was one of those models that was erect from the beginning, and stayed hard the entire shoot. This video is pretty much in real time, and we only stopped occasionally so that he wouldn�t accidently bust. The whole thing really turned him on!
I loved photographing him too. We went down to the beach and we get to see the city boy take on the cold waters of the Pacific. You get to see more of his charming playful attitude.
While I would love to see that big unit of his splitting a dude in two, he�s content doing solos and of course wants only to do straight films. But I will keep hitting him up occasionally to see if we can get him to do some "one on one" action. It never hurts to ask!
title: Mario - Solo
